alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 8:26PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Nye and south central Eureka Counties through 900 PM PDT... At 826 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 34 miles west of Duckwater, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northern Nye and south central Eureka Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Nye County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County
